Step 1.Planning: Take the blender out of the cabinet

Step 2.Planning: Take the instant coffee out of the cabinet

Step 3.Planning: Take the cane sugar out of the cabinet

Step 4.Planning: Take the chocolate milk out of the electric refrigerator
